price: (Nkͻmhyεni), kae εberε a Yεdanee Jinn kuo bi ani kyerεε wo hͻ, na wͻtiee Qur’aan (akenkan), εberε a wͻbaa hɔ no, wͻka kyerεε (wͻn ho) sε: ”Monyε komm! Ԑberε a (akenkan no) siiε no, wͻdanee wͻn ho kͻͻ wͻn nkorͻfoͻ hͻ kͻbɔɔ (wͻn) kɔkɔ.
arabic: وَإِذۡ صَرَفۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ نَفَرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ فَلَمَّا حَضَرُوهُ قَالُوٓاْ أَنصِتُواْۖ فَلَمَّا قُضِيَ وَلَّوۡاْ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِم مُّنذِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ṣarafnā ilayka nafaran mina al-jini yastamiʿūna al-qur'āna falammā ḥaḍarūhu qālū anṣitū falammā quḍiya wallaw ilā qawmihim mundhirīna
